lessons_learned: Repository Pattern enables testability and maintainability - dependency injection allows easy mocking and testing
WordPress wp-config.php syntax errors can cause blank 500 errors - always check for duplicate blocks and broken comments
Bilateral coordination accelerates completion - parallel execution with complementary skills (technical + content) multiplies effectiveness
Workspace organization critical for efficiency - archived inbox messages improve focus and reduce noise
